pages.text: The remote detonator is the heart of the C4 explosives, without it the C4 becomes useless. To link a block of C4 to the remote right click it, you will hear a two tone sound from low to high. To detonate the explosive Shift-Right Click and another two tones play this time the same tone twice.

Once linked you can either wait for the right time or by right clicking the block again you can unlink the block and a two tone sound will play this time from high to low. Should a block be broken the remote will tell you that one or more blocks were destroyed.
